title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 02 April 2012 - XWiki
content:
00:02 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* rc9606e9 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/c9606e974887b598ef6315627003d24d3d737dd6 / (2 files in 2 dirs): XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...

00:21 <+sburjan`> because I guess you're not doing it by hand  
00:22 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* r9ff3906 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9ff3906883802895b20ab044a8ba07994280ed47 / (13 files): [Misc] Normalize and nicely format the XAR XML files - http://git.io/pa5qCw

00:25 <+sburjan`> I see  
00:25 <+sburjan`> I don't understand one thing  
00:27 <+sburjan`> lol, I see there are 3 OutputFormat classes out there .. was looking at the wrong one  
00:28 <+sburjan`> so basically our XE xar will contain indented content ?  
00:32 <vmassol> yes  
00:32 <vmassol> the xar is just a zip  
00:32 <+sburjan`> yes, I know

08:16 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:21 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:24 <+tmortagne> Hi guys  
08:24 <+tmortagne> jenkins is in a worst state than before the weekend...  
08:24 <vmassol> yep it's me  
08:24 <vmassol> hi tmortagne  
08:25 <vmassol> but it's not as bad as it looks (at least for platform, haven't touched the others)  
08:25 <vmassol> let me skip the verification for now  
08:25 <jvelociter> has quit  
08:26 <vmassol> give me 1mn and I 'll fix platform  
08:26 <vmassol> fyi it's http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XCOMMONS-145  
08:28 <vmassol> hmm I can either remove the check or continue fixing modules as I started yesterday  
08:28 <+tmortagne> commons also have a xar related test failure  
08:29 <vmassol> yes I know why  
08:29 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* rb3dab65 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/b3dab65768d30d2275f2705c721c6961a860d40b / xwiki-commons-tools/xwiki-commons-tool-xar/xwiki-commons-tool-xar-handlers/src/main/resources/META-INF/plexus/components.xml : XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...  
08:33 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* ra8ad065 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/a8ad065ec4ebc190b37ccbdec714a48d14b2584b / xwiki-commons-tools/xwiki-commons-tool-xar/xwiki-commons-tool-xar-integration-tests/src/test/resources/format/ExpectedWebHome.xml : XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...  
08:34 <vmassol> tmortagne: I wanted to finish cleaning up all xars modules but fell asleep before last night  
08:34 <+tmortagne> :)  
08:37 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* ra902f79 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/a902f79ab55b3b50312c36520952cd1580ef438c / (2 files in 2 dirs): Put back legacy and retro-coompatibility informations - http://git.io/t9d0Rg  
08:40 <vmassol> sdumitriu: ping  
08:40 <vmassol> (good morning)

09:11 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:15 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* r62c6ccd https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/62c6ccd4d35b1333f5a9092b2fdc15f528232745 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-oldcore/src/main/java/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.java : XWIKI-7670: Make class references always local ...  
09:21 <CIA-120> tmortagne master \* rf603a96 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/f603a9660ff4543cfd7a080a18951f096d25b19d / (2 files in 2 dirs): XWIKI-7670: Make class references always local ...  
09:21 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* r3658db3 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/3658db3e09b0da5ad9ba06683fed241eff3ab974 / xwiki-commons-tools/xwiki-commons-tool-xar/xwiki-commons-tool-xar-plugin/src/main/java/org/xwiki/tool/xar/FormatMojo.java : XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...  
09:22 <+tmortagne> that should fix most of the remaining warnings about class reference  
09:23 <+tmortagne> any idea why http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/org.xwiki.enterprise$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/1124/testReport/org.xwiki.test.ui/LoginTest/testLoginWithInvalidCredentials/ fail ?  
09:25 <+tmortagne> either the "Invalid credentials" changed or the login did not failed as it should be  
09:26 <+sburjan> something might have changed, because I didn't see any "Invalid Credentials" error macro  
09:26 <+tmortagne> did you see anything ?  
09:26 <+sburjan> or maybe I'm just blind  
09:26 <+sburjan> no, just redirect to login page  
09:26 <+sburjan> but I might be blind  
09:26 <+tmortagne> that sounds wrong  
09:27 <+tmortagne> I think you would have seen it, from what I remember its sipposed to be displayed just before the login form  
09:27 <vmassol> the error message is on the login page normally  
09:27 <vmassol> yep  
09:27 <+tmortagne> and in red I think  
09:27 <+tmortagne> testing  
09:28 <+tmortagne> vmassol: isn't test on jenkins supposed to save a screenshot or something  
09:28 <+tmortagne> ?  
09:28 <vmassol> depends on the apis used but usually yes  
09:28 <vmassol> give me 5 mn and I'll chekc thisus ecase  
09:28 <+sburjan> nope, I don't get any red warning .. at least no on chrome  
09:28 <+sburjan> seems I'm not blind  
09:29 <+tmortagne> downloading the last maven build  
09:29 <+sburjan> nothing on FF either  
09:30 <+sburjan> so maybe it's just my computer who is dumb  
09:30 <+tmortagne> also I can see that there is no warning about deprecated use of message tool which is typically supposed to be used for this kind of message (the actual error message in stored in the context)  
09:30 <+tmortagne> or used to at least  
09:30 <+tmortagne> maybe someone tried to fix it  
09:31 <+sburjan> true.. you're saying about the login.vm warning in the console being deprecated, right ?  
09:31 <+tmortagne> sburjan: yep  
09:31 <jvelociter> has quit  
09:31 <+tmortagne> AFAIK this is used just for theses error messages  
09:32 <+tmortagne> checking if something changed in there  
09:33 <+tmortagne> no modification to login.vm in a while at least  
09:36 <+tmortagne> sburjan: it's working well for me with the last build on maven.xwiki.org  
09:36 <+tmortagne> I get the "Invalid credentials" in red  
09:37 <+tmortagne> wondering why it does not work for you and jenkins  
09:37 <jvelociter> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <+tmortagne> ( with http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/4.0-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.0-20120331.110209-161.zip )  
09:41 <+tmortagne> I can see that the last xwiki-enterprise-test-ui build is older than this version of xe  
09:41 <+tmortagne> maybe it's ok now  
09:41 <+tmortagne> sburjan: what version are you testing ?  
09:41 <+tmortagne> maybe it was caused by missing legacy  
09:42 <+sburjan> tmortagne: friday's snapshot  
09:42 <+sburjan> xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.0-20120329.211740-156.zip  
09:42 <+tmortagne> sburjan: can you check if you have the legacy jars  
09:42 <+tmortagne> the oldcore one in this case I think  
09:43 <+tmortagne> xwiki-platform-legacy-oldcore  
09:43 <+sburjan> checking now  
09:44 <+sburjan> did someone delete the old snapshots from maven ? I only see one which is from 31 march  
09:45 <+sburjan> no, I don't have any legacy jar in my snapshot  
09:45 <+tmortagne> ok lets wait for a new build of xwiki-enterprise-test-ui then  
09:45 <+tmortagne> that's nexus  
09:46 <+tmortagne> it's keeping only one snapshots older than two fays  
09:46 <+tmortagne> days  
09:46 <+sburjan> xwiki-platform-linkchecker-api-4.0-20120329.202531-60.jar is the only one jar with "l"  
09:46 <+tmortagne> ok  
09:46 <+tmortagne> probably the same issue on jenkins  
09:47 <+tmortagne> there was issue with legacy packages Friday that vmassol fixed  
09:47 <+tmortagne> I think I fixed all test failing because of class reference warning so all should be ok now I think  
09:48 <+tmortagne> lets see  
09:48 <vmassol> it's possible I messed up when I refactoring the profiles  
09:48 <vmassol> \*refactored

11:10 <vmassol> tmortagne: do you remember if we want to use more jdom or dom4j?  
11:14 <vmassol> btw there's jdom 1.1.3 now: http://www.jdom.org/news/index.html  
11:15 <vmassol> and jdom2 in the work: https://github.com/hunterhacker/jdom/wiki/JDOM-2.0  
11:15 <vmassol> "JDOM 2.0 is ready to release. Easter 2012."  
11:19 <+sburjan> vmassol: the issue about fixing the ignored tests should be reported as a bug, right ?  
11:20 <vmassol> sburjan: either bug or improvement  
11:20 <+sburjan> ok, going to report it as a bug, maybe it will be more visible :)  
11:29 <+sburjan> vmassol: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XE-1146 tell me if it's ok from your POV  
11:30 <+sburjan> and going to add also a reason to all ignores which will point to this issue  
11:32 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <bkolev> users of this channel helping each other with xpages right ?  
11:35 <vmassol> bkolev: hi, with xwiki in general  
11:36 <bkolev> nice  
11:36 <bkolev> thanks :)  
11:43 <+tmortagne> vmassol: nop, no idea which one we want to use, I doubt we really decided  
11:43 <+tmortagne> probleme is that we don't always use them directly, some of ours dependencies use one or the other  
11:44 <+tmortagne> so we can decide which one we use ourself but will probably be hard to get rid of the other  
11:46 <vmassol> ofc  
11:47 <+tmortagne> looks like we have an unstopped XWiki instance running or some agents  
11:47 <+tmortagne> getting Caused by: java.net.BindException: Address already in use  
11:47 <+tmortagne> checking  
11:48 <+tmortagne> pretty much all tests project are failing because of that  
11:50 <+tmortagne> therer is one on agent-4  
11:51 <+tmortagne> looks like it's stuck, will have to do a kill -9  
11:53 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* r9b569ad https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/9b569ad8528b840be6446315766605b131273271 / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-cache/xwiki-platform-cache-infinispan/pom.xml : XWIKI-7675: Align and rationalize Build profiles ...  
11:57 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* ref63c69 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/ef63c6955ab16a7d708712331f4657ccc4427047 / (9 files in 4 dirs): XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...  
11:57 <vmassol> tmortagne: commons should be ok now  
11:57 <+tmortagne> vmassol: ok cool  
11:57 <+tmortagne> waiting for webstandard but all integration tests are ok now  
11:57 <+tmortagne> will probably start the release after lunch  
11:58 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* r2620b14 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/2620b1450d0ab9303c9eafc2e264008d43edbfbb / (18 files): [Misc] Normalize and nicely format the XAR XML files - http://git.io/RH-noA  
11:58 <vmassol> going to run xar:format on all platform modules now :)  
11:58 <vmassol> I'd like to put back auto verification asap  
11:58 <+tmortagne> ok  
12:00 <vmassol> grrr  
12:00 <vmassol> I don't understand, on some xml files I get too many new lines but not on  other....  
12:01 <vmassol> maybe some have different line endings  
12:02 <+tmortagne> pretty usre old wiki pages have mixed line ending since they have mixed line ending when exporting and it's automatically fixed only when you commit with git (we were not doing much with svn)  
12:03 <+tmortagne> (mixed line ending in the same XML file)

12:15 <vmassol> strange

14:57 <DrLou> has joined #xwiki  
15:05 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
15:10 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
15:11 <whantana> has joined #xwiki  
15:23 <whantana> hi all , anyone available to discuss the GsoC Idea of Intergrating XWiki with another open source tool ?  
15:24 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
15:45 <+sburjan> vmassol: created the pull request to exclude tests  
15:50 <@sdumitriu> Hi whantana  
15:50 <whantana> hello  
15:51 <whantana> i just installed XE  
15:51 <@sdumitriu> vmassol: Pong  
15:51 <whantana> looks pretty good :D though a little daunting with all that stuff on the screen  
15:51 <whantana> anyway my idea is to integrate XWiki with the Transifex project  
15:52 <whantana> Transifex is a platform for crowdsourcing translators to your project to translate it from english to any other language  
15:52 <whantana> you can check it out at transifex.net  
15:52 <@sdumitriu> Did you check http://l10n.xwiki.org?  
15:52 <whantana> my idea was to provide a workflow for the user  
15:52 <whantana> sdumitriu: yes i have  
15:53 <whantana> but i think this page refers to xwiki itself  
15:53 <whantana> i was thinking about the content the user provides  
15:53 <@sdumitriu> Hm... I don't see that Transifex is open source  
15:53 <whantana> let's say a user adds several pages and want to translate them . So he uploads them on transifex, translators come along  
15:54 <whantana> it is actually it started from Gsoc 2007  
15:55 <whantana> what i want to propose is a workflow for the user to have his content on the localization platform as easily as possible  
15:55 <@sdumitriu> Right, I found the open source link now  
15:56 <whantana> from there translators do their job and the user can obtain the translations within the wiki  
15:56 <whantana> via downloading them  
15:56 <whantana> Transifex has developed a REST api to pull/push translations and stuff  
15:57 <whantana> i can have a more detailed picture of this in the application later  
15:58 <whantana> but this is a rough picture of my idea  
16:03 <whantana> I am not proposing that Xwiki moving from http://l10n.xwiki.org but provide it's users the capability of translating their wikis using the platform  
16:04 <whantana> although I would suggest it , cause Transifex model of localization process seems pretty good. Some people see Transifex as the github of l10n  
16:10 <nIMBVS> has joined #xwiki  
16:10 <sdumitriu> has quit  
16:10 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:21 <CIA-120> Vincent Massol master \* rd3a3da6 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/commit/d3a3da6f5ef937499c3f74170be62fe8c99669ae / (15 files in 6 dirs): XCOMMONS-145: Add new Verify and Format Mojos in XAR plugin ...  
16:29 <@sdumitriu> whantana: To be honest, I'm not very convinced about this idea  
16:29 <@sdumitriu> Since the wiki is supposed to be collaborative already  
16:29 <@sdumitriu> Going for breakfast, bbl  
16:30 <vmassol> I haven't followed your discussion but personally I'd like  a system where transaltions are done directly in XE by user and they submit their translations automaitcally to a central server (l10n)  
16:30 <vmassol> something similar to what jenkins is doing  
16:31 <vmassol> for ex on http://ci.xwiki.org/  
16:31 <vmassol> check the bottom  
16:31 <vmassol> "http://ci.xwiki.org/#http://ci.xwiki.org/#"  
16:31 <vmassol> oops
